subject.topic: Louisiana State University and Agricultural and Mechanical College. University College

mods.abstract: Page 58 of the album includes three photographs.; Photograph 1 [220] shows four cattle tied to wooden fence posts.; Photograph 2 [221] shows a bull surrounded by LSU cadets with notebooks in a fenced yard with crops in background. Dr. W.H. Dalrymple stands behind the cow.; Photograph 3 [222] shows several cattle in a fenced yard. Two men and buildings are shown directly behind them [probable Experiment Station].
mods.note: Photograph of W.H. Dalrymple (approx. 1916). Retrieved August 4, 2014, from http://www.louisianadigitallibrary.org/cdm/singleitem/collection/LSU_UAP/id/2365/rec/111
